qrList.label: 02. Generate Appearance Info (Can Generate Multiple)
qrList.message:
/setvar key=catgen "Appearance Info"|
/setvar key=genid "2"|


//setvar key=swipe Yes|

/:"Character Maker V4.Get Char info"|


/ife {: /test left=type right=None rule=neq :}|
	/then {: /setvar key=typef "{{getvar::fname}}'s genetalia is {{getvar::type}} in form." :}|
else {: /setvar key=typef {{noop}} :}|

/setvar key=heightInfo {{noop}}|
/ife {: /test left=species right=Human rule=eq:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTure true :}|
/elseif {: /test left=species right=Anthro rule=in:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTure true :}|
/elseif {: /test left=species right=Beastkin rule=in:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTure false :}|
/elseif {: /test left=species right=Pokemon rule=in:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTure false :}|
/elseif {: /test left=species right=Animal rule=in:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTure false :}|
/else {: /setvar key=isTure false :}|

/ife {: /test left=isTure right=true rule=eq:}|
	/then {: /addvar (This is the Height of {{getvar::fname}} when standing on two legs. It is mesured from the ground to the top of the head.)
:}|
/else {: /addvar (This is the Height of {{getvar::fname}} when standing on fore legs. It is mesured from the ground to it's withers.)
:}|

/setvar key=genState Redo|

/while left=genState right=Redo rule=eq {:
	/echo Generating Height|
    /setvar key=genState []|  

	/genraw lock=on name={{char}} 
	system="{{getvar::rules}}
{{getvar::info}}
{{getvar::char_info}}

Here is some examples:
Example1: 187cm
Example2: 1.87m
Example3: 90cm
Example4: 10m"
{{instructInput}} You are {{char}}. Based on the conversation between you and {{user}}: "{{getvar::messageHistory}}". Now, provide a comma-separated list of five numeric heights for {{getvar::fname}}. The heights whould be approriate for {{getvar::age}} {{getvar::gender}}'s of the species {{getvar::species}}. 
INSTRUCTION: Use the right pronounce. Emululate the examples given. The heights should be in centimeter or meter depending on what is more approriate for {{getvar::species}}'s. The response should be a comma-separated list of five heights, nothing else.
{{instructFirstOutput}}|

	/setvar key=t {{pipe}}|
	/re-replace replace="" find="/\./g" var=t | /setvar key=t {{pipe}}|
	/split var=t | 
	/setvar key=genState {{pipe}}|
    /addvar key=genState "Manually Add"|  
    /addvar key=genState Redo|  

    /buttons labels={{getvar::genState}} Select a height (Should end in cm or m).|

    /setvar key=selected_btn {{pipe}}|

    /ife {: /test left=selected_btn right="" rule=eq :}|
		/then {:/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"| /echo Aborting | /abort:}|
    /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::selected_btn}} right="Manually Add" rule=eq :}|
		/then {:
			/input rows=8  Add your own height (End with cm or m).|
			/setvar key=selected_btn {{pipe}}|
			/ife {: /test left=selected_btn right="" rule=eq :}|
					/then {:/:"Character Maker V4.Flushvar"| /echo Aborting | /abort:}|
		:}|

    /elseif {: /test left={{getvar::selected_btn}} right=Redo rule=eq :}|
		/then {:
			/setvar key=genState Redo|
		:}|
:}|
/setvar key=height {{getvar::selected_btn}}|


/setvar key=lenght None|
/ife {: /test left=species right=Human rule=eq:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTrue false :}|
/elseif {: /test left=species right=Demi-Human rule=in:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTrue false :}|
/elseif {: /test left=species right=Anthro rule=in:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTrue false :}|
/elseif {: /test left=species right=Beastkin rule=in:}|
	/then {: /setvar key=isTrue false :}|
